name: TheSpy - 150 Weekly Game Jam Version
description:
Be a spy and try to overthrow the dictator (it is not possible for the moment :') ).

On this card game you have to take choices. You will also discover many stories.

This game was made under the 150 Weekly Game Jam event  which had has theme :

'You're the Enemy'

To play,  you have to swipe cards with the mouse (or your finger in you are on smartphone).

During the fights, attack is slide the card to left, defence, is slide to down and dodge is slide to right.

On this short version, the goal is to defeat the instuctor. But be carefull, he will be very strong, especially if you attack it direcctly ... each fight rise you statistics.

The 150 Weekly Game Jam

Soon updated version :

https://mightycode.itch.io/the-spy

Please report bugs on comments thanx .

Credit :
